Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Cards

Interface Requirements

All Known Implementing Classes:
CardRequirements, ResourceReqDev, ResourceReqLeader
public interface Requirements
interface containing the necessary methods for managing the methods to buy a card

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkReq​(Board board)
    This method checks if the requirements of the card are met, otherwise an InvalidActionException is thrown.
    boolean checkReq​(Board board, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> shelves, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> quantity, java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> strongbox)
    This method checks if the requirements of the card are met, otherwise an InvalidActionException is thrown.
    java.util.LinkedList<CardQuantity> getCardRequirements()  
    java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getRequirements()  

  • Method Details

    • checkReq

      boolean checkReq​(Board board) throws InvalidActionException, ResourcesExpectedException
      This method checks if the requirements of the card are met, otherwise an InvalidActionException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      board - is the board on which we are checking the requisites
      Returns:
      true if the player's board meets the requirements of the card
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the requirements are not met
      ResourcesExpectedException - if the card needs more information to check the requirement.

    • checkReq

      boolean checkReq​(Board board, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> shelves, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> quantity, java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> strongbox) throws InvalidActionException
      This method checks if the requirements of the card are met, otherwise an InvalidActionException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      board - is the board on which we are checking the requisites
      shelves - ArrayList of Integer which represents all the shelves selected
      quantity - ArrayList of Integer which represents the amount of resources selected for each shelf
      strongbox - ArrayList of ResQuantity which represents all the resources selected from the strongBox It is important that each resource is present at most once
      Returns:
      true if the player's board meets the requirements of the card
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the requirements are not satisfied

    • getRequirements

      java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getRequirements()
      Returns:
      HasMap(Resource,Integer) with all the resources present in the requirements

    • getCardRequirements

      java.util.LinkedList<CardQuantity> getCardRequirements()
      Returns:
      LinkedList of CardQuantity with all the cards present in the requirements
